context.rdfs:comment: A direction indicating a single action to do in the instructions for how to achieve a result.
context.rdfs:label: HowToDirection

properties.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances before performing this direction.
properties.rdfs:label: beforeMedia

properties.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances after performing this direction.
properties.rdfs:label: afterMedia

properties.rdfs:comment: A media object representing the circumstances while performing this direction.
properties.rdfs:label: duringMedia
